This game is so fun! I've never played anything even close to it before, and for the money, it's incredible. If you're between this and Friday the 13th you cn't really go wrong, but this game offers a little more to work for. Plus, as someone who prefers to play as the killer, I appreciate the ability to solely play that way if I want. I recommend watching some streamers play it before you start grinding; it'll help a ton. 10/10.

Игра хорошая. Графика приличная. Бывают иногда лаги, но игре не мешают. Игра для компании друзей, у которых реакция хорошая и вообще просто любят побегать друг от друга. В принципе, игра стоит своих денег. Персонажи интересные, как выжившие, так и убийцы.

Костюмы стали более детализированны со временем, эторадует, но все-таки баги не покидают эту прекрасную игру, точно также как и кемперы.

Very fun, very casual, recommended, thats the TL;DR. Of course there's a few problems, mostly related to the community behavior, such as camping, harassing, or ragequitting. You'd be surprised on how people friend invite you just to curse.

Gamemplay wise, it's straighforward, but I recommend watching some broadcasts first to get acquainted to the general do and do not, it can be a bit frustrating when you don't understand at first the core mechanics, obviously, and it seems that everybody expects that you do so right off the bat.

i'd say an easy 8/10.

Pretty good game.

Balancing is all over the place and tons of glitches the devs could fix if they weren't on vacation all the time.
Full of adrenaline rushing parts when the killer is after you or if the survivors are on the verge of escape.
Lots of diversity in the loadouts and many different killers to play as to mix it up.

7.5/10, good game but needs some fixes
Too many campers (and salty survivors)

After a few hours of gameplay, what i can say is that this game has a lot to offer but could use a bit of work here and there. I can say that it was one of the best experiences of my gaming life (also because i love this type of game like Friday the 13th: The game) for my first 5 hours, untill i noticed somethings that could be worked on. First thing's first, the survivors, i believe that the balance in between the task we have to acomplish as a survivor is quite at the level of what was expected, it's challanging and it's fun at the same time, exept when we are a unballanced level of players, the matchmaking on this game is not the best. I at the time have 15 hours of gameplay and i already got to be in a game with people that played for 700 hours and i ended up by ruining their experience of the game, i believe that we could use some ballance not only for the survivors, but for the players in general, what i mean is that the survivors and the killers should be at the same level of gameplay to ballance the games. Now, killers, there are a few killers, they are not the best but we could say that they are decent, but, they are not scary enough, the challange is allways the same and it's not scary after a while, me on my personal opinion believe that the game could have something more scary, a new scarier character, or some jumpscares during the game, for as much as i enjoy it during a game (but after i think that it could use a bit more of that) to be calm, to focus on my task, i would like to know allways that i am being hunted, ant the killer is allways present during the game, maybe you guys should consider putting an ingame enviroment music to keep the pressure. Now, there's one specific killer that i would like to give a opinion that has bugging me from the begining, the nurse is way too op.. i mean.. cmon.. she can tp eveywhere and it doesn't affect her.. whe allways get fuc*ed when a nurse is in the game.. Please consider lowering ther abilities and add a debuff or something to give us a shot to escape. One more thing.. if it's possible.. consider optimizing the game for people with lower pc builds are able to play..
Concluding, it's a great game and i love to play it, but this things kinda trip me. I hope this game goes far and keeps on getting content (and also a new gamemode plz).

Having played this game i found the content and gamplay very linear. no option to defend yourself from the creature and theres only one method of escape. Overall i think this game is lacking in long term playability and frankly if you're wanting a good survival horror game of this style i would recommend Friday the 13th, implements all these games features and so much more. Before any asshats comment saying i dont even own friday the 13th. I do but on PS4. So be a good boy Jason, make mommy proud and buy Friday the 13th

这是我目前为止最喜欢的游戏，也许很大一部分原因是因为我还在努力上人皇这个阶段中。
杀机是我朋友带我入坑的，结果就一发不可收拾了。一开始以为暴力血腥，不太相信自己会入坑，但因为他的刺激性，还有看直播时主播溜屠夫的快感，我还是忍不住买了这个游戏。我现实比较怕鬼，刚玩杀机那会儿，我这个萌新抖了很多很多天，游戏还没进去，我整个人都在颤抖中，甚至上课时都会抖，我那个时候觉得，现实里怕啥鬼，杀机里的鬼才叫可怕，尤其是刚开始玩，遇到屠夫两秒都没有就能趴，周围的人每天听我各种惨叫。
之后，我去qq加杀机的qq群，求大佬带我飞，从此我就有了杀机的师父了，师父对我很好，想玩的时候都可以叫他带，接下来又认识了很多玩杀机的朋友，开黑的时候真的很开心，大家都很照顾我。我很感谢他们我这么菜他们都肯叫我一起玩，只是当时我们都没意识到，其实我自己的电脑和网可能都不太好，在玩了杀机八十多个小时之后，终于有人让我去网吧试试了，然后我二十多天没玩杀机，找了时间去网吧，那次的感受真的太特别了，那种流畅度，3D感真的特别棒，我终于能真正的玩杀机了，终于不用担心qte了，终于能和师父说我进步了。配置真的是游戏的硬伤啊。
后来我开始像大佬们请教鬼追着时该怎么跑，那些地方该怎么绕，他们开内战教我，同时我也自己看视频看直播学习，现在终于不会看到鬼哥就秒倒了。
杀机这个游戏，人类的体验真的挺棒的，每一局都是未知的情况，可能遇到凶残的屠夫，也可能会遇到善良的屠夫，萌哒哒的屠夫，都很开心。最喜欢加好友了，游戏里游戏外收获的友谊也是很珍贵的。
但是鬼的话，我玩的很少，就不说些什么了。
我希望杀机能越做越好，让大家都喜欢。
另外说一句，我最喜欢护士姐姐了！！！
Хорошая игра !!!!!

This game is a lot of fun but can get incredibly frustrating. The terrible matchmaking will put four rank 20 survivors against a rank 1 killer many times, and that's so unfair. There are camper killers, that completely ruins some of the matches. There are also balancing issues as well as lag issues. Other than that, it's addicting, rewarding, has a nice learning curve and progression system. Playing with friends is highly recommended, so you can all rage together!

印象·杀机
初遇杀机是在某直播平台，它恰似一朵喋血的玫瑰，那般肆意惊艳，引着你梦萦魂牵。
沾染着宗教意味的献祭敛住了它原本倾泻欲出的血腥，衍生出张弛自如的暴力美学。
看着它从小作坊游戏的池淖中一步步的萌发茁壮，相信是每个老玩家最欣慰的事了。
制作组很良心也很亲民：1免费的护士长者2红爪黑衣3周年庆一大波良心皮肤4更有专门为践约国服玩家而打造的某电疗屠夫。等等
攻略·简单
其实它是一个心理学游戏而非恐怖游戏，玩家需要从纷乱环境中提取出有用的信息，并依据这些信息结合自己的游戏经验（套路）与屠/人进行一轮轮关乎生死的博弈。所谓的恐怖因素只有在刚接触这门游戏时才会有，随着游戏时间的增长，你的人/屠技术不断提升，它会逐渐变成一个具有强烈对抗性的竞技游戏。当你开始预判屠/人的行动并能从容地规划自己的逃跑/追杀路线时，证明你已经上手了。
